title: Pink Place: A lyrical journey to the safe place and inner drive deep inside every child!
description: Pink Place & Blue Blaze is Two-for-One Special Edition for children, with two complete stories in one book. Each story takes readers on a lyrical journey to discover and nurture special places within themselves. Pink Place helps children find their own inner safety and joy, while Blue Blaze helps them to discover their inner drive and motivation. A portion of each retail sale is donated to CASA, to support their vital work (www.casaforchildren.org)
author: Deb Simpson
